articles.description: Adding to Pixar's pantheon of creative originals, coming-of-age 'Turning Red' explores female pubescence with a teen girl who turns into a red panda.
articles.content: Say what you will about the studio's hit-or-miss sequels, be they with Woody and Buzz or Lightning McQueen, but theres nothing like a good, highly creative Pixar original. Case in point: the new Turn… [+3806 chars]

articles.author: Elliot C. Williams
articles.title: Kusama's 'One With Eternity' Hirshhorn Exhibit Opens In April - DCist
articles.description: Yayoi Kusama's wildly popular Infinity Mirror rooms return to the Smithsonian's Hirshhorn Museum and Sculpture Garden this spring.
